title: Facial expressions in babies - informed consent

content.question:
Professor Abdi is interested in the ability for babies to make facial expressions within the first year of their lives. He believes that babies in all cultures develop facial expressions in the same sequential order. To test his hypothesis, Professor Abdi will expose babies ranging in age from 2 weeks to 12 months to various situations. He will observe their facial expressions for anger, disgust, sadness, happiness, surprise, and fear.
Which of the following ethical guidelines must Professor Abdi consider while conducting his research?

choices.label: An operational definition of each facial expression

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
